name: StoicalZebra Wishlist
description: Merged wishlist from YouTube god roll videos - 2026-01-14

data.name: Martlet - Repulsor Brace + Destabilizing Rounds
data.description: A classic Void synergy roll where Destabilizing Rounds applies Volatile to nearby targets. Source: Maven - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gX7K0OBNw_Q

data.name: Martlet - Firefly + Destabilizing Rounds
data.description: This combination creates massive chain reactions in low-level content; Firefly's solar explosion can trigger Destabilizing Rounds. Source: Maven

data.name: Martlet - Kill Clip PvP
data.description: Kill Clip is essential as it enables a two-burst kill on this archetype. Keep Away is preferred for range/accuracy. Source: Maven

data.name: Martlet - Repulsor Brace + Withering Gaze
data.description: A niche utility roll where aiming for a short duration triggers Withering Gaze to weaken the target. Source: Maven

data.name: Riptide - PvE Utility
data.description: Standard high-utility rolls for PvE. Chill Clip remains excellent for utility. Source: Legoleflash - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IvsMxN8ssuU

data.name: Riptide - Speed Build
data.description: A unique speed-focused combination. Cornered and Controlled Burst together create the fastest possible charge time. Source: Legoleflash

data.name: Riptide - PvP Range
data.description: Focuses on maximizing the range stat to 73 (climbing to 83 via Closing Time) to push the accuracy cone. Source: Legoleflash

data.name: M-17 Fast Talker - PvP
data.description: Delicate Tuning provides a massive boost to range and accuracy at the start of the burst (low heat). Source: IFrostBolt - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sVpWGniF9vo

data.name: All Or Nothing - Overclocked Heat Sink
data.description: This roll focuses on maximizing the 540 RPM archetype's lethality. Overclocked Heat Sink provides a damage boost. Source: IFrostBolt - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fKQm5rltGck

data.name: All Or Nothing - Kill Clip
data.description: The stacking damage bonuses from the weapon's archetype, the Overclocked Heat Sink battery, and Kill Clip create insane TTK. Source: IFrostBolt

data.name: Modified B-7 Pistol - PvP
data.description: Keep Away is the essential 'must-use' perk to improve the weapon's accuracy. Source: IFrostBolt - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dq8SOcIavak

data.name: Compact Defender - PVE
data.description: Great burst damage, speed buff, damage boost from frame, passive reload. Spec for minimal heat generation. Barrel: look for a little range. Then look to maximize 'shoot longer' perks. Source: Legoleflash - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ljg_7aSDdUU

data.name: Compact Defender - PVP Faster Cooling
data.description: Barrel: Different versions/options available to reach the recommended 70 stability & 43 Range sweet spot. Battery: Overclocked Heatsink is currently (2026-01-13) bugged with 'laggy damage', but look for this perk also for easy perk swap once bug is fixed. Column 1: Delicate Tuning is a top-tier PvP recommendation that functions as 'reverse closing time'. Column 2: Precision Instrument for built-in forgiveness (3h2b). V1 - emphasizes cooling efficiency for less reloads. Source: Legoleflash

data.name: Compact Defender - PVP Fire Longer
data.description: Same stat targets but heat generation perks let you fire longer, at cost of some reload slowness (PVP Top Choice). Stab MW + Range Mod recommended. Source: Legoleflash
